items.name: Air Zoom Pegasus
items.description: Low-top mesh sneakers in black. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Logo bonded at tongue. Padded collar. Signature Swoosh bonded in white at sides. Text and logo printed at white foam rubber midsole. Treaded rubber outsole in white.

items.name: Air Max Pre-Day LX
items.description: Low-top canvas sneakers in green. Tonal suede trim throughout. Round toe. Lace-up closure in white. Textile logo flag at padded tongue. Padded collar. Webbing pull-loop in orange and logo embroidered in white at heel counter. Buffed leather Swoosh appliqué in orange at sides. Sculptural rubber midsole in off-white and black featuring Zoom Air unit and embossed logo at heel. Treaded rubber outsole in black.

items.name: Blazer Mid ’77
items.description: High-top suede sneakers in green. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Textile logo patch at padded tongue. Padded collar. Logo embroidered in green at white buffed leather heel tab. Buffed leather Swoosh appliqué at sides. Textured rubber midsole in white. Treaded rubber outsole in white.

items.name: Air VaporMax Plus
items.description: Low-top bonded jersey sneakers in black. Rubberized trim in black and gold-tone throughout. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Logo patch in gold-tone at padded tongue. Padded collar. Grosgrain pull-loop at heel collar. Logo printed in yellow and white at rubberized heel tab. Swoosh in gold-tone at outer side. Transparent gold-tone treaded rubber sole featuring VaporMax Air technology.

items.name: Air Force 1 '07 LV8 Peace And Unity
items.description: Low-top paneled buffed leather, suede, tweed, and faux-leather sneakers in black. Perforated detailing at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Textile logo patch at padded canvas tongue. Padded collar in green. Buffed faux-leather Swoosh appliqué at sides in black and yellow. Logo embroidered in yellow at suede heel tab. Textured rubber mid-sole featuring embossed logo in orange at outer side. Treaded rubber outsole in orange and purple.

items.name: Manoa Boots
items.description: Ankle-high leather boots in tan. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure at vamp. Logo patched embroidered in brown at padded tongue. Padded collar in black. Pull-loop tab at heel. Tonal Swoosh logo embossed at sides. Rubber midsole in white. Treaded rubber outsole in tan. Gold-tone hardware.

items.name: Air Max 96 II
items.description: Low-top panelled mesh and buffed faux-leather sneakers in white, black, and teal. Swoosh embroidered in white at round toe. Lace-up closure in white. Logo embroidered at padded tongue. Padded collar. Rubberized Swoosh in white and teal, and rubberized appliqué in grey at heel tab. Swoosh appliqué in black, grey, and teal at sides. Sculptural foam rubber midsole featuring transparent Air Sole unit. Treaded rubber outsole in black.

items.name: Air Presto
items.description: Low-top mesh sneakers in purple, orange, blue, and white. Transparent rubberized trim at round toe. Lace-up closure in purple. Tonal Swoosh embroidered at vamp. Tonal rubberized logo patch at padded tongue. Padded collar. Grosgrain pull-tab at heel. Foam rubber midsole in white featuring rubberized Swoosh in purple. Treaded rubber outsole in black.

items.name: Free Run Trail
items.description: Low-top paneled suede, mesh, and ripstop sneakers in navy and orange. Perforated detailing throughout. Logo embossed at round toe. Rubberized logo appliqué in transparent and orange at beige lace-up closure. Logo embroidered in orange at padded tongue. Padded collar. Embroidered Swoosh in orange at outer side. Grosgrain pull-loop in orange at heel collar. Swoosh embroidered in navy at heel counter. Treaded foam rubber sole in beige featuring logo embossed at outer side.

items.name: Air Vapormax 2021 FlyKnit
items.description: Low-top Flyknit sneakers in grey and green. Round toe. Lace-up closure in grey. Textile logo patch in black at tongue. Elasticized collar. Swoosh bonded in green at sides. Webbing pull-loop in black at heel collar. Rubberized trim in grey and logo printed in black and green at heel counter. Transparent treaded rubber sole featuring VaporMax Air technology.

items.name: Air Presto
items.description: Low-top mesh sneakers in blue, green, red, and white. Transparent rubberized trim at round toe. Lace-up closure in white. Swoosh embroidered in blue at vamp. Rubberized logo patch in blue at padded tongue. Padded collar. Grosgrain pull-tab at heel. Foam rubber midsole in white featuring rubberized Swoosh in blue. Treaded rubber outsole in black.

items.name: Blazer Low '77
items.description: Low-top suede and buffed leather sneakers in yellow. Round toe. Lace-up closure in white. Textile logo patch at exposed foam tongue. Padded collar. Eyelet vents and leather Swoosh appliqué in white at sides. Logo printed in black at white heel tab. White textured and treaded rubber sole.

items.name: Blazer Mid '77 Infinite
items.description: High-top buffed leather sneakers in white featuring tonal, green, and orange rubberized trim throughout. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Tonal logo patch and raw edge at padded tongue. Padded collar. Rubberized Swoosh appliqué in orange, green, and black at sides. Logo embroidered in black at heel tab. Treaded rubber sole in off-white.

items.name: Flow 2020 ISPA
items.description: Low-top paneled nylon mesh and rubber sneakers in multicolor. Round toe. Lace-up closure in purple. Logo bonded in black at tongue. Webbing pull-loop at tongue and heel tab. Logo bonded in black and brown at heel counter. Swoosh printed in black and tonal logo embossed at brown rubber and foam midsole. Treaded rubber and foam outsole in brown.

items.name: Air Max Tailwind Skepta Low
items.description: Low-top panelled mesh and rubber sneakers in black, red, and silver. Rubberized trim in black throughout. Round leather cap toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Rubberized logo in black and text embroidered in silver at padded tongue. Padded collar. Signature Swoosh embroidered in silver at sides. Tonal foam rubber midsole featuring signature Tuned Air sole unit. Treaded rubber outsole in black.

items.name: Air Max 95 SE
items.description: Low-top paneled mesh, twill, and canvas sneakers in navy. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Bonded logo in off-white and embroidered graphic in green and brown at padded tongue. Padded collar. Cork trim in tan and canvas trim in grey at sides. Swoosh embroidered in tan and off-white at outer side. Embroidered logo in off-white at heel tab. Foam rubber midsole in off-white featuring signature Air Sole unit. Treaded rubber outsole in brown. Contrast stitching in tan.

items.name: Blazer Low '77 Vintage
items.description: Low-top buffed leather sneakers in white. Suede trim in grey at round toe and outer side. Tonal lace-up closure. Tonal patent leather trim at vamp. Textile logo patch in green at padded canvas tongue. Padded collar. Eyelet vents and suede Swoosh appliqué in green at sides. Logo embroidered in white at green suede heel collar. Textured and treaded rubber sole in off-white.

items.name: Air Max 90
items.description: Low-top paneled buffed leather, mesh, suede, and canvas sneakers in tones of beige and off-white. Multicolor polka dot pattern throughout. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Rubberized logo appliqué at vamp. Logo embroidered at padded tongue. Padded collar. Grained leather Swoosh appliqué in white at sides. Rubberized logo appliqué in pink at heel tab. Textured foam rubber midsole in pink featuring signature Air Sole unit. Treaded rubber outsole colorblocked in pink and beige.

items.name: Air Zoom Vapor Pro
items.description: Low-top mesh sneakers in white. Bonded trim in off-white throughout. Round toe. Offset tonal lace-up closure. Textile logo patch at tongue. Padded collar. Rubberized Swoosh appliqué in black at outer side. Bonded Swoosh and logo at inner side. Transparent rubber trim at welt. NikeZoom foam rubber midsole. Treaded rubber outsole colorblocked in white and black.

items.name: Space Hippie 04
items.description: Low-top recycled Flyknit sneakers in grey. Swoosh embroidered in orange at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Textile logo flag in white and black at tongue. Elasticized collar. Logo-embroidered pull-loop in grey and orange at back collar. Transparent mesh overlay at green heel tab. Swoosh embroidered in orange at outer side. Topstitching in orange at inner side. Signature Nike grind Crater Foam rubber midsole in green featuring speckled pattern in multicolor. Treaded waffle rubber outsole in green featuring speckled pattern in multicolor.

items.name: Wildhorse 7
items.description: Low-top mesh sneakers in orange. Round toe. Lace-up closure in blue and black. Text printed in black at padded tongue. Padded collar. Logo bonded in blue at inner side. Swoosh bonded in tones of blue at outer side. Webbing pull-loop in blue at heel tab. Signature textured React® foam rubber midsole in blue and grey featuring speckled pattern in green. Treaded rubber outsole in orange and tones of blue.

items.name: Air Force 1 High '07
items.description: High-top buffed leather sneakers in white. Perforated detailing at round toe. Logo hardware at tonal lace-up closure. Tonal textile logo patch and cinch fastening at padded tongue. Padded collar. Tonal Swoosh appliqué at sides. Tonal Swoosh embroidered at heel tab. Tonal mesh lining. Tonal rubber midsole with embossed logo at outer side. Tonal treaded rubber outsole. Silver-tone hardware.

items.name: Court Rallye Slip
items.description: Low-top canvas slip-on sneakers in white. Round toe. Padded collar. Tonal elasticized gusset at sides. Tonal logo printed at outer sides. Embossed logo at tonal buffed faux-leather heel tab. Tonal treaded rubber sole.

items.name: Adilette Comfort Slides
items.description: EVA rubber slip-on sandals in black. Open round toe. Signature stripes embossed at vamp. Embossed logo at tonal molded rubber footbed. Tonal treaded EVA rubber sole.

items.name: Rod Laver
items.description: Low-top knit sneakers in white. Suede trim in grey at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Textile logo patch in green and white at padded tongue. Padded collar. Logo and style name embossed in white at green buffed leather heel tab. Textured rubber midsole in off-white featuring logo embossed at outer side. Treaded rubber outsole in green. Tonal hardware.

items.name: Handball Spezial
items.description: Low-top paneled suede sneakers in blue. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Textile logo patch woven in white and gold-tone at tongue. Padded collar. Buffed leather heel tab in white. Logo printed in gold-tone at outer side. Signature serrated leather stripes in white at sides. Ortholite® insole. Textured rubber midsole in tan featuring embossed logo at outer side. Treaded rubber outsole in tan.

items.name: Forum Mid
items.description: High-top paneled buffed leather sneakers in white. Perforated detailing at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Tonal textile logo patch at padded tongue. Padded collar. Adjustable Velcro ankle strap featuring rubberized logo patch. Signature serrated stripes and perforated detailing at sides. Tonal logo bonded at outer side. Tonal rubberized trim at heel counter. Tonal rubber midsole featuring embossed logo at outer side. Tonal treaded rubber outsole. Tonal hardware.

items.name: Forum Exhibit Low
items.description: Low-top paneled grained leather and suede sneakers colorblocked in white, off-white, pink, and taupe. Perforated detailing throughout. Round toe. Lace-up closure in white. Textile logo patch at padded tongue. Padded collar. Serrated signature stripes in beige and off-white at sides. Logo printed in pink at outer side. Rubberized trim in taupe at heel counter. Tonal textured rubber midsole featuring embossed logo at outer side. Treaded rubber outsole in beige.

items.name: Parley Edition Nizza Hi
items.description: High-top padded and quilted sneakers in off-white. Thread detailing in multicolor throughout. Round rubber cap toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Logo bonded in black at tongue. Tonal webbing pull loop at heel tab. Textured rubber platform midsole. Treaded rubber outsole. Silver-tone hardware. Approx. 2" heel, 1" platform.

items.name: Retropy E5
items.description: Low-top paneled suede and ripstop sneakers in grey. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Logo printed in white and perforated detailing at rubberized tongue. Padded collar. Tonal logo embossed at white buffed leather heel tab. Signature serrated stripes in white at sides. Foam rubber Boost™ midsole in off-white. Treaded rubber outsole in taupe. Tonal hardware.

items.name: Primeblue NMD_R1
items.description: Low-top knit Primeblue sneakers in black. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Logo patch in white and black bonded at tongue. Elasticized padded collar. Tonal grosgrain pull-loop featuring logo and stripes printed in white at heel collar. Embossed logo at tonal rubberized heel tab. Signature stripes bonded at sides. Signature Boost™ foam rubber midsole in white and black featuring logo printed at outer sides. Treaded rubber outsole in tan.

items.name: Primeblue NMD_R1
items.description: Low-top knit Primeblue sneakers in black. Round toe. Stripe bonded in blue at vamp and sides. Tonal lace-up closure. Logo patch in blue and white bonded at tongue. Elasticized padded collar. Signature stripes bonded in white at sides. Tonal grosgrain pull-loop featuring logo and stripes printed in blue at heel collar. Rubberized trim in blue featuring logo embossed in white at heel. Signature Boost™ foam rubber midsole in white and blue featuring logo printed at outer side. Treaded rubber outsole in blue.

items.name: Camo ZX 2K Boost Utility
items.description: Low-top paneled ripstop sneakers featuring camouflage pattern in tones of beige, khaki, and black. Coated canvas trim in beige throughout. Round toe. Lace-up closure woven in black and reflective silver-tone. Zip closure at vamp. Padded collar. Tonal logo printed at outer side. Webbing pull-loop in black and embossed logo at heel. Textured rubber trim in black at heel counter. Gore-Tex® lining. Foam rubber midsole in white. Treaded rubber outsole in black.

items.name: 4D Fusio
items.description: Low-top Primeknit sneakers in tones of fluorescent yellow and green. Glow-in-the-dark trim throughout. Round toe. Tonal lace-up closure featuring tonal modified rubberized eyerows. Tonal bonded logo patch at tongue. Padded collar. Tonal rubberized pull-loop at heel collar. Tonal rubberized trim at welt. Tonal signature Digital Light Synthesis 3D-printed rubber midsole Tonal treaded rubber outsole.

items.name: Ultraboost 21
items.description: Low-top Primeblue and Primeknit sneakers in black. Logo embossed at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Rubberized logo patch at tongue. Padded collar. Rubberized trim with signature stripes at sides. Reinforced rubber heel counter featuring logo embossed at outer sides. Signature foam rubber Boost™ midsole in white. Treaded Stretchweb Continental™ rubber outsole in off-white, grey, and black.

items.name: Strike Boots
items.description: Ankle-high buffed calfskin boots in white. Tonal rubberized trim featuring embossed logo at round toe and heel. Tonal lace-up closure. Pull-loop at heel collar. Tonal treaded rubber sole. Tonal hardware.

items.name: Lace-Up Speed 2.0
items.description: High-top textured stretch knit recycled textile sneakers in black. Perforated detailing throughout. Rubberized logo appliqué in white at round toe. Lace-up closure woven in black and white. Rib knit collar. Sculptural rubber midsole in white featuring embossed logo at heel. Tonal treaded rubber outsole featuring No Memory technology.

items.name: Speed 2.0
items.description: High-top knit recycled textile sneakers in beige featuring logo printed in black throughout. Round toe. Rib knit collar. Tonal sculptural rubber midsole featuring logo embossed at heel. Tonal treaded rubber outsole featuring No Memory technology.

items.name: Tractor Boots
items.description: Ankle-high polished calfskin Chelsea boots in black. Round toe. Pull-loop at collar. Elasticized gusset at sides. Logo embossed at vamp. Tonal leather lining. Tonal textured midsole. Tonal treaded rubber outsole with logo embossed in white. Approx. 2" platform.

items.name: Faded Triple S
items.description: Low-top paneled faux-leather and mesh sneakers in black. Fading throughout. Text embroidered in grey at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Grosgrain pull-loop and rubberized logo at padded tongue. Padded collar. Logo embroidered in grey at outer side. Pull-loop at heel collar. Sculptural rubber midsole in white featuring painted trim in black and logo embossed at heel. Treaded rubber outsole in white featuring painted trim in black .

items.name: Track Clear Sole
items.description: Low-top layered mesh, faux-leather, and rubber sneakers in blue. Metallic silver-tone trim throughout. Embroidered number in white and embossed logo at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Webbing pull-loop and embossed logo at padded tongue. Padded collar. Webbing pull-loop and rubberized logo patch at heel collar. Logo printed in white at outer side. Tonal sculptural foam rubber midsole. Tonal treaded rubber outsole.

items.name: Speed LT 2.0
items.description: High-top stretch knit sneakers in navy. Round toe. Rib knit collar. Logo printed in white at outer side. Tonal sculptural rubber midsole featuring embossed logo at heel. Tonal treaded rubber outsole featuring No Memory technology.

items.name: Triple S
items.description: Low-top paneled faux-leather and mesh sneakers colorblocked in blue, grey, and white. Faux-suede trim in black throughout. Text embroidered in black at round toe. Lace-up closure in blue and white. Grosgrain pull-loop and rubberized logo at padded tongue. Padded collar. Logo embroidered in white at outer side. Pull-loop at heel collar. Sculptural rubber midsole colorblocked in white, black, and blue featuring logo embossed at heel. Treaded rubber outsole in blue.

items.name: Track.2 Open Sneakers
items.description: Low-top layered mesh, faux-leather, and rubber sneakers in white. Cut-outs throughout. Embossed logo at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Rubberized logo in white at padded tongue. Padded collar. Logo embossed in black at outer side. Webbing pull-loop and embossed logo at heel tab. Foam rubber midsole in black featuring rubberized trim in red at heel. Treaded rubber outsole in black.

items.name: Triple S
items.description: Low-top paneled faux-leather and mesh sneakers in pink. Text embroidered in black at round toe. Lace-up closure woven in pink and black. Grosgrain pull-loop and rubberized logo at padded tongue. Padded collar. Logo embroidered in black at outer side. Pull-loop at heel collar. Tonal sculptural rubber midsole featuring logo embossed at heel. Tonal treaded rubber outsole.

items.name: Clear Sole Triple S
items.description: Low-top paneled buffed faux-leather and mesh sneakers in orange. Number embroidered in black at round toe. Tonal lace-up closure. Rubberized logo and grosgrain pull-loop at padded tongue. Padded collar. Grosgrain pull-loop at heel collar. Logo embroidered in black at outer side. Tonal translucent rubber midsole. Tonal treaded rubber outsole.

items.name: Track Hike
items.description: High-top layered mesh, faux-leather, and rubber sneakers in beige. Embroidered number in black and embossed logo at round toe. Beige and black lace-up closure. Webbing pull-loop and faux-leather logo patch at padded tongue. Padded collar. Webbing pull-loop and rubberized logo patches at heel tab. Logo printed in black at outer side. Eyelet vents at inner side. Tonal textured foam rubber midsole. Tonal treaded rubber outsole. Tonal hardware.
